snippet: In a meeting with President Benigno S. Aquino III, President Obama said the two countries would “consult closely together” as part of the “pivot by the United States back to Asia.”
abstract: Pres Obama, in meeting with Filipino Pres Benigno S Aquino III, expresses support for Philippines in its maritime dispute with China; two countries have been locked in a tense standoff for two months over rights to a cluster of reefs and rocks in the South China Sea known as Scarborough Shoal.
lead_paragraph: In a meeting with President Benigno S. Aquino III, President Obama said the two countries would “consult closely together” as part of the “pivot by the United States back to Asia.”

headline.seo: Obama Shows Support for Philippines in China Standoff
headline.main: Obama Expresses Support for Philippines in China Rift
headline.print_headline: Obama Expresses Support For Philippines in China Rift
